page.title: 01ARBURY CT. SHOPPING PRECINT
page.content: ARBURY COURT IS A SHOPPING PRECINT OFF OF ARBURY ROAD AND ACROSS THE ROAD FROM OUR SCHOOL. HERE IS A LIST OF THE AMENITIES: A PUB CALLED THE SNOW CAT, A LAUNDRETTE TWO ANDREW McCULLOCHS, (ONE IS A VIDEO CASSETTE HIRE SHOP, THE OTHER SELLS ELECTRICAL GOODS). THE COURT HOUSE IS A LADIES HAIRDRESSERS, P.J.HURST OWNS A SHOP THAT SELLS WOOL, PRIME IS A GREEN GROCERS. THERE IS A POST OFFICE AND HARDWARE STORE WHICH SELLS LOTS OF DIFFERENT THINGS. ARBURY MOTORIST CENTRE SELLS TOYS AND CAR PARTS. FORBUOYS IS A NEWSAGENTS AND TOBBACCONIST. TURNERS IS A FISH AND CHIP SHOP.MARKILLIES,A BAKERS AND CONFECTIONERS,A BUTCHERS,A CHEMISTS WITH DISPENSARY,A CLEANERS, SUPERMARKET,A LIBRARY AND A CAR PARK COMPLETES THE SHOPPING PRECINT SERVING AN AREA KNOWN AS ARBURY.
